https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/5i3ZUjsjDWrcqPGRoKrHsAltBvD.jpg An adaptation of Doblin's text to 2015 Berlin to tell the story of 30-year-old refugee Francis, the sole survivor of a boat which crossed the Mediterranean illegally. Without citizenship papers, Francis is drawn into the underbelly of the city. Berlin Alexanderplatz
